question: A museum near your home is looking for people to do part-time voluntary/unpaid work. You would like to do some voluntary/unpaid work at the museum. Write a letter to the museum director to apply for the voluntary/unpaid work. In your letter explain why you want to do voluntary/unpaid work at the museum, describe some skills and qualities you have that would be useful and give details of when you would be available to work.
text: I am writing this letter to express my interest to work part-time in the museum.I was informed by the recruitment agency that you are looking to hire part-time employees.It could be great if I am considered for the position once you have gone through my details.

My name is Rehana and currently,I am pursuing a degree in arts at the University of Hyderabad.The experience gained from this work will help  me in completing my thesis,which is on Persian art,displayed in the museum.I will also gain valuable guidance from famous curators of your museum.

I have done diploma in assessing the timeline of ancient relics from the University of Delhi.I can work in the ancient relics department along with your regular staff to help handle the work.I am a hard-working and disciplined person,and I am a great team player too.Additionally,I can give counselling to budding artists.

I have  my mid-term exams till the 24th of March,after which I will be available .I am free from morning  till late afternoon;however,I am busy in the evenings as I have a  summer project to finish.I will be able to volunteer for 30 days,after which my semester starts and it could be difficult to balance my workload and a part-time job.
